New Records: Fakhar Zaman scored 126 not out, the highest score by a Pakistan player in the match
Pakistan won by 21 runs using the DLS method
Fakhar Zaman's innings was his best in the World Cup
Key Match Events: Pakistan recovered from a rain delay to chase down a target of 401
Fakhar Zaman and Babar Azam formed a crucial partnership to win the match
The match was called off due to rain but Pakistan were declared winners by 21 runs under DLS
Post-Match Reflections: Kane Williamson praised Pakistan's performance and the impact of the rain
Babar Azam credited Fakhar Zaman's innings and expressed confidence for the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was interrupted by rain, affecting the game's progression
Pakistan's win helped them level on points with New Zealand
The rain also affected other matches in the tournament
Others: The match highlighted Fakhar Zaman's ability to win difficult matches
The result impacted Pakistan's World Cup campaign
